basic.description:
An independent advanced project or thesis in any area of the basic curriculum, supervised and evaluated by faculty. Completed applications must be submitted by 15 March of students¿ third year for Department approval. Consult faculty advisers or supervisor for detailed information well in advance of the deadline. 
NOTE    In addition to the prerequisites indicated below, the department may require a grade of A- in any DRAM course relevant to the subject of study.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Senior Project
